sentences.en: A swarm of bees are following the queen - bee to find a suitable place to establish a new home.
sentences.cn: 一群蜜蜂跟着蜂王去寻找个合适的地方建立新家.

sentences.en: A swarm of mosquitoes fly into the room.
A swarm of people encircled the hotel.
sentences.cn: 一大群人围住了这个酒店。

sentences.en: A swarm of planets absorbed most of the available angular momentum.
sentences.cn: 一大群行星吸收了大部分有效角动量.

sentences.en: At last a swarm settled in a hive.
sentences.cn: 终于有一群蜂落进了蜂巢.

sentences.en: He is hiving a swarm with care.
sentences.cn: 他正小心地把一群蜂移入蜂房.

sentences.en: Photographers were swarming around the princess.
sentences.cn: 摄影师们一窝蜂地围在公主身边。

sentences.en: The dike swarm converges on West Spanish peak.
sentences.cn: 岩脉群汇聚于西西班牙峰.

sentences.en: There is a swarm of bees in the tree.
There we are in a swarm.
sentences.cn: 对此我们是渺无头绪的.

sentences.en: These shores will still swarm with the dead of my people.
sentences.cn: 这一带海岸仍将到处有我们祖先的英灵出没.

sentences.en: They swarm and swoon around him.
sentences.cn: 他们围着他团团转,百般勾引他.

sentences.en: When bees swarm, hundreds of them come together in a great mass.
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂搬家时都挤成一大团.

sentences.en: Within minutes the area was swarming with officers who began searching a nearby wood.
sentences.cn: 几分钟之内这个地方挤满了警官，他们开始搜查附近的一片树林。

trans.tran_en: a large group of insects, especially  bee s  ,moving together
if people swarm somewhere, they go there as a large uncontrolled crowd

trans.tran_cn: 泛滥，挤满，云集，涌往，成群地移动或出现，成群飞离蜂巢(用于蜜蜂)
trans.tran_en: If a place is swarming with people, it is full of people moving about in a busy way
